#Introduction
In this book, you will learn about Lauren.

#Main Story
Lauren is a Digital Projects Coordinator at the Library of Congress. She works within the Digital Collections Management and Services Division, and she manages a variety of digital projects with the help of her great coworkers.

#Conclusion
